backend/main.mo: Main actor defining academic tracking and coding practice data types (SubjectScores, AcademicEntry, CodingChallenge, etc.), state variables (academicEntries, boardExamResults, codingAttempts, etc.), and public functions for access control, profile management, academic data CRUD, coding challenges, and data export/import with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old and new actor types with identical structures for academic entries, board exam results, coding attempts/challenges, and user profiles, providing a run function that performs identity migration (no data transformation needed).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four high-confidence features: displaying raw marks instead of percentages, enabling grade filtering by section and term, fixing 9-scale grading calculations, and calculating letter grades from percentage thresholds.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including main App component, query hooks with Score9Scale support, academic/coding modules, forms with raw marks input, progress views with filtering, data management, user management, and utility functions for percentage calculations.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags for SEO and viewport configuration, mounting the React application at the root div element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing authentication flow with Internet Identity, profile setup for new users, admin detection, and module navigation (academic/coding/data/users) with loading states and theme provider integration.
frontend/src/components/AcademicModule.t: Academic module container with four-tab interface (Add Marks, View Progress, Subject Analysis, 9-Scale Grades) that automatically switches to Progress View after successful mark submission.
frontend/src/components/AddMarksForm.tsx: Form component for adding academic marks entries with support for different grades (1-12), terms, streams, and subgroups. Handles subject selection, marks input with configurable max marks, and calculates grades and percentages before submission.
frontend/src/components/CodingEditor.tsx: Interactive Python code editor component that allows users to select coding challenges, write and execute Python code using Pyodide, view output, and save attempts with optional scores.
frontend/src/components/CodingHistory.ts: Displays a list of saved coding attempts in an accordion format, showing challenge titles, timestamps, scores, submitted code, and execution results for each attempt.
frontend/src/components/CodingModule.tsx: Tab-based container component that switches between the CodingEditor and CodingHistory views for the Python coding practice module.
frontend/src/components/DataManagement.t: Provides data import/export functionality with support for JSON and CSV formats, allowing users to export academic entries, coding attempts, or full data exports, and import data back into the system.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright information and a link to caffeine.ai with an animated heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header with module switcher (Academic, Coding, Data, Users), theme toggle, and Internet Identity authentication login/logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/NineScaleGradesV: Displays academic grades on a 9-point scale with filtering by grade, section, and term. Converts raw marks to 9-scale grades using max marks validation and fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for initial user profile setup where users enter their name. Uses mutation hook to save profile data.
frontend/src/components/ProgressView.tsx: Shows academic progress with sortable/filterable table of entries, charts for term percentages, and displays board exam results and grade aggregates. Includes letter grade calculation.
frontend/src/components/SubjectAnalysisV: Analyzes subject performance with statistics (average, highest, lowest marks) and bar charts. Filters by grade, section, and term with max marks validation.
frontend/src/components/UserManagement.t: Admin interface for assigning user roles (user/admin) by entering Principal IDs. Uses mutation hook for role assignment.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePyodide.ts: React hook that loads and manages Pyodide (Python runtime in browser), providing a runPython function that executes Python code and captures stdout/stderr output.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, academic entries, board exam results, coding challenges, and admin operations via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components like sidebar, cards, charts, and semantic tokens.
frontend/src/lib/boardExam.ts: Utilities for Grade 10 board exam calculations, including AI subject substitution logic that replaces the lowest of Math/Science/Social if AI score is higher.
frontend/src/lib/gradeCalculation.ts: Grade calculation utilities that convert raw marks to letter grades (A+ to F), 9-scale grades (0-9), and percentages with color coding for display.
frontend/src/lib/maxMarks.ts: Defines grade-wise maximum marks rules for regular subjects, Computer, and AI across grades 1-12, with special handling for board exams (100 marks per subject).
frontend/src/lib/percent.ts: Utility functions for percentage calculations including clamping to 0-100 range, formatting with decimals, and calculating percentages from marks.
frontend/src/lib/subjectAnalysis.ts: Computes subject-wise statistics (average, highest, lowest, count) from academic entries by calculating percentages using max marks logic with fallbacks, and returns sorted stats with display names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme properties (border radius, shadows, animations), and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking four known issues related to marks display showing percentages instead of raw numbers, broken filtering by section/term, broken 9-point grading, and incorrect grade calculation logic using grading system numbers instead of percentage thresholds.
